Biological Systems Engineering.1: Apply knowledge of mathematics, physics, and the engineering sciences.
Biological Systems Engineering.2: Apply knowledge of the chemical and biological sciences, and biological systems engineering.
Biological Systems Engineering.3: Design and conduct experiments, utilize probability and statistics, as well as to analyze and interpret data.
Biological Systems Engineering.4: Design a system, component, or process to meet desired needs.
Biological Systems Engineering.5: Function on teams, including multi-disciplinary teams.
Biological Systems Engineering.6: Identify, formulate, and solve engineering problems.
Biological Systems Engineering.9: Understand the impact of engineering solutions in a global and societal context.
Biological Systems Engineering.10: Recognize the need for, and an ability to engage in, life-long learning.
Biological Systems Engineering.11: Have a knowledge of contemporary issues.
Biological Systems Engineering.12: Use the techniques, skills, and modern engineering tools necessary for engineering practice.
